games.title: Geometry Dash Lite
games.description: Geometry Dash Lite - Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer!
games.longDescription: Geometry Dash Lite is an exciting rhythm-based action platformer that challenges your reflexes and timing. Navigate through a series of challenging obstacles, spikes, and platforms while listening to an energetic soundtrack. Jump, fly, and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles. This game combines precise platforming with rhythm-based gameplay for an addictive experience.
controls: Space bar or Click to jump
Hold to keep flying in ship mode
tips: Listen to the music rhythm for better timing
Practice mode helps learn difficult sections
Watch for visual cues and patterns
Don't give up - persistence is key!

games.title: Retro Bowl
games.description: Retro Bowl - Build your dream football team and lead them to victory in this classic sports management game!
games.longDescription: Retro Bowl is a classic sports management game that challenges you to build your dream football team and lead them to victory. Manage your team's roster, schedule, and training to maximize your chances of success. This game combines strategic management with addictive gameplay for an engaging experience.
tips: Manage your team's roster and schedule
Train your players to improve their skills
Use your budget wisely to build a competitive team

games.title: Solitaire
games.description: Solitaire - Play the classic card game of solitaire!
games.longDescription: Solitaire is a classic card game where you have to build a pyramid of cards. The game is played with a deck of 52 cards, and the goal is to build a pyramid of cards by moving cards from one pile to another.
